headlines.description: Genoa boosted their hopes of Serie A survival with a 2-0 win over bottom-of-the-table SPAL on Sunday, their first win in six games.
headlines.shortLinkText: Genoa boost survival hopes with first win since restart

headlines.description: Fabio Quagliarella scored on his return from injury and Federico Bonazzoli scored with an overhead kick to help Sampdoria beat Udinese.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bonazzoli overhead kick moves Sampdoria away from drop zone

headlines.description: AC Milan midfielder Franck Kessie converted a penalty to rescue a 2-2 draw away to Napoli in Serie A.
headlines.shortLinkText: Kessie capitalises as AC Milan, Napoli draw
